backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control, approval workflow, and admin‑restricted role management.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing APK generation workflow and associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of human‑written summaries for all frontend source files and assets.
frontend/ANDROID_APK.md: Comprehensive guide for building, signing, and publishing the Android APK including prerequisites and troubleshooting.
frontend/android-apk-output/.gitignore: Gitignore rules excluding APK artifacts and temporary files in the APK output directory.
frontend/android-apk-output/.gitkeep: Keeps the otherwise empty APK output directory in version control.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore for Android project artifacts, build outputs, IDE files, keystores, and sensitive configs.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle app module config defining SDK versions, signing logic, build types, and asset rules.
frontend/android/app/capacitor.build.gra: Generated Capacitor build config setting Java 17 compatibility and plugin variables.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard rules keeping all com.wordhunt.game classes and providing optional debugging settings.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest defining app metadata, main activity, FileProvider, and required permissions.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/w: MainActivity extending Capacitor BridgeActivity for the Android app.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Splash screen drawable showing a primary color background with centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Defines primary, dark primary, and accent colors for the Android theme.
Resource strings for app name, title, package name, and custom URL scheme.
App theme definitions including action‑bar and splash‑screen variants.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/xml/fi: FileProvider path configuration allowing cached and external file access.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top‑level Gradle build file configuring repositories, plugin versions, and the clean task.
frontend/android/capacitor-cordova-andro: Gradle config for Capacitor Cordova plugin module with SDK settings and dependencies.
Generated Cordova variables defining min/compile/target SDK versions.
frontend/android/capacitor.settings.grad: Generated Capacitor settings including module includes for all Capacitor plugins.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Configures Gradle JVM settings, AndroidX support, Flipper version, CPU ABI filters, new architecture flag, and Hermes engine usage.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Defines Gradle wrapper distribution settings pointing to Gradle 8.4.
frontend/android/gradlew: POSIX shell script to launch the Gradle wrapper using the system JVM.
frontend/android/gradlew.bat: Windows batch script for launching the Gradle wrapper.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Includes the app module and Capacitor Cordova plugins, and applies Capacitor settings.
frontend/android/signing.properties.exam: Example template for configuring Android release keystore signing credentials.
frontend/android/variables.gradle: Defines Android build SDK versions and dependency version variables.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, web directory, Android scheme, and build options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: App entry HTML setting metadata, PWA manifest, icons, and loading the main React module.
frontend/public/downloads/.gitkeep: Placeholder to keep the downloads directory for APK publication.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, and categories.
frontend/scripts/build-android-apk.sh: Bash script to build debug or release Android APKs with optional signing and publish outputs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component rendering the WordHuntScreen inside a full-height container.
frontend/src/components/game/DifficultyS: Empty placeholder component file for selecting game difficulty.
frontend/src/components/game/GameControl: React component showing progress, timer, and inputs to adjust time limits with callbacks.
Renders the interactive letter grid, handling pointer selection and highlighting found or selected cells.
frontend/src/components/game/WordHuntScr: Main game screen managing puzzle lifecycle, timer, APK availability check, and rendering grid, word list, and controls.
frontend/src/components/game/WordList.ts: Displays a sortable list of words and visually marks those already found.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login/logout logic, session handling, and context for identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useWordHuntGame.ts: Manages Word Hunt game state, including puzzle generation, selection logic, found words, and countdown timer.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/duration.ts: Utility functions for parsing, converting, validating, and clamping game duration values.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/generator.ts: Generates a word-hunt puzzle by placing words randomly into a grid and filling remaining cells with random letters.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/selection.ts: Provides logic for selecting contiguous grid cells, converting them to words, and validating matches.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/time.ts: Formats a number of seconds into MM:SS with clamping at zero.
frontend/src/lib/wordhunt/words.ts: Exports a fixed list of automotive-themed words used for puzzle generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, plugins, and animations for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, notes, features, and known issues for the Word Hunt Game app.
